post:
SKB Enterprise Offers 2GB VPSes for €3.99/mo in the Netherlands!

netherlands, skb enterprise, skbe January 10, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

SKB Enterprise has returned!  We first featured them in April of 2020, and then they stopped by again in September.  They’re from the Netherlands and run on some pretty speedy gear: NVMe SSD nodes and AMD Ryzen 9 CPUs.

So what’s on offer this time?

  • 2GB VPSes at €3.99/mo!
  • Or step up to 4GB at €7.99/mo!

In their own words: “These VPS servers run on our brand new super-fast NVMe SSD VPS nodes equipped with AMD Ryzen 9 CPUs giving a very high-performance VPS. We configure and build our VPS Hypervisors ourselves so we can achieve the highest performance. We only select RAM with the highest clock, NVMe SSDS with the best IOPS, Speeds for example.”

And to add a little about the SKB Enterprise:

“We are a hosting company operating from The Netherlands since 2013. We offer Webhosting, VPS, and dedicated servers from our datacenter in Amsterdam, The Netherlands on our premium rock solid network with A-brand hardware. We have staff available 24/7 to answer questions and resolve problems.”

They are registered in the Netherlands (company number 69737770),  They accept PayPal, CreditCard, Alipay, Wechatpay, Cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash), iDEAL, Sofort.  You can read about their Terms of Service on their web site.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!
